Verses: 1 senaigalin Karththaave, Umadhu Vaasasthalangal Evvalavu Inbamaanavaigal!
2 en Aaththumaa Karththarudaiya Aalayappiraagaarangalinmel Vaanjaiyum Thavanamumaayirukkiradhu; En Irudhayamum En Maamsamum Jeevanulla Dhevanai Nokkik Gembeera Saththamidugiradhu.
3 en Raajaavum En Dhevanumaagiya Senaigalin Karththaave, Ummudaiya Peedangalandaiyil Adaikkalaan Kuruvikku Veedum, Thagaivilaan Kuruvikkuth Than Kunjugalai Vaikkum Koodum Kidaiththadhe.
4 ummudaiya Veettil Vaasamaayirukkiravargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Eppozhudhum Ummaith Thudhiththukkondiruppaargal. (selaa.)
5 ummile Belankollugira Manushanum Thangal Irudhayangalil Sevvaiyaana Vazhigalaik Kondirukkiravargalum Baakkiyavaangal.
6 azhugaiyin Pallaththaakkai Uruva Nadandhu Athai Neerootraakkikkollugiraargal; Mazhaiyum Kulangalai Nirappum.
7 avargal Balaththinmel Balam Adaindhu, Seeyonile Dhevasannidhiyil Vandhu Kaanappaduvaargal.
8 senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, En Vinnappaththai Kelum; Yaakkobin Dhevane, Sevikodum. (selaa.)
9 engal Kedagamaagiya Dhevane, Kannokkamaayirum; Neer Abishegampanninavarin Mugaththaip Paarum.

10 aayiram Naalaippaarkkilum Umadhu Piraagaarangalil Sellum Ore Naal Nalladhu; Aagaamiyak Koodaarangalil Vaasamaayiruppadhaippaarkkilum En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Vaasarpadiyil Kaaththiruppadhaiye Therindhukolluven.
11 dhevanaakiya Karththar Sooriyanum Kedagamumaanavar; Karththar Kirubaiyaiyum Magimaiyaiyum Aruluvaar; Uththamamaai Nadakkiravargalukku Nanmaiyai Vazhangaadhiraar.
12 senaigalin Karththaave, Ummai Nambiyirukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
